getUserPendingRewards(address).details: get pending rewards by specific user

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

remoteEnable().details: enable remote staking (stake to PancakeSwap LP farming pool).

totalPendingRewards().details: distribute single bond pool first, then LP pool will get the remaining rewards. see _updatePools

accPancakeRewardsPerShares.details: accumulated cake rewards of each lp token.

remoteEnabled.details: whether remote staking enabled (stake to PancakeSwap LP farming pool).

bondRewardsSuspended().notice: mark bond reward is suspended. If the LP Token needs to be migrated, such as from pancake to ESP, the bond rewards will be suspended.you can not stake anymore when bond rewards has been suspended.

remoteEnabled().notice: It cannot be modified from true to false as this may cause accounting problems.
